sentences.english: Don't assume that he views you as nothing more than an object for him to use.
sentences.chinese: 不要認爲他只是把你當作泄慾工具。

sentences.english: In this way, a flow-through channel is formed from the input point up to the discharge point.
sentences.chinese: 從而從溶液的注入端到泄液點形成一個直流通道。

sentences.english: Morale should be boosted, not dampened.
Sluice valves are to be of a non-rising stem type and to have solid wedge discs.

sentences.english: Their functional feather is excretion without storage and taking descending and unobstruction as their normal functional state.

sentences.english: On May 17th party supporters vented their anger on the streets.

sentences.english: The 21.4m (70ft) high gravity dam is essentially an 18-bay gated spillway.
sentences.chinese: 4米高的重力大壩基本上是一座18孔的泄水壩。

sentences.english: Flame temperature is a very important parameter of the detonating fusee.
sentences.chinese: 火焰溫度是泄爆管重要性能參數。
